Name: Magical Cat Cafe and Heroes
About the game: The game introduction An unknown flu in the rapid spread of unknowingly, cats in the first time to organize, together against this strange enemy. Cats from all walks of life have joined in the fight against the epidemic, providing their own strength. As a bystander in a different world, does the wizard BuÂ·Amber have any means to help the cats? Learn about each cat's experience and the story behind them through the conversation. And don't forget the mysterious visitors! Production team and message We're CorvusCorax_studio. We are very happy to have all of you supporting us in making this game, which was originally made to honor the hard work and dedication of the people involved in this new pandemic. And thank you for your solidarity in this outbreak. In honor of those who contributed to the epidemic from all walks of life, we will periodically reinvest a portion of our earnings from the game into the fight against the epidemic. We hope you will remember their efforts. Thank you for your support and attention! Disclaimer This game is the background of the fictitious world, which involves the characters, the story is purely fictional, if there are similarities, purely coincidental.
